summary: This is an email chain from December 2018 regarding the creation of a shared drive for the USAO case 2018R01618 (U.S. v. Jeffrey Epstein). It involves an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York requesting IT support to set up the shared drive and provide access to the listed individuals.

persons.name: Lou
persons.context: Addressed in the email requesting the creation of a shared drive for the Epstein case.

events.title: Request for shared drive creation
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York sends an email requesting the creation of a shared drive for case 2018R01618 (U.S. v. Jeffrey Epstein).

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated December 3-4, 2018, concerning the creation of a shared drive for the Jeffrey Epstein case (2018R01618).
The request is made by an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York, indicating active federal prosecution preparations in late 2018.
The email includes instructions to avoid loading large files like audio/video/PST files into the shared directory, suggesting the case involves multimedia evidence.
The case is formally referenced as 'U.S. v. Jeffrey Epstein', confirming it as a federal prosecution.
Multiple individuals with USANYS email addresses and contractors are cc'd, showing a team involved in the case management.
